review_data.title: Excellent value for money
review_data.content: Good food and service at very moderate prices (for Zurich). Italian food, both pizze and other options. Home-made deserts (was recommended the tiramisu and did not regret). Cosy, seems to be family-run. Will eat here again.

review_data.title: Nice family place with good pizza
review_data.content: We visited this place because we were at Stadelhofen and our kids wanted pizza. We were very happy to have found Sorrento & it was unexpectedly good, both for the pizza and for the service. While our young server was friendly enough, the owner (I...More

review_data.content: Sorrento ist zu meinem Lieblingsrestaurant geworden. Die Bedienung ist extrem freundlich, willkommend und aufmerksam. Es hat eine grosse Auswahl an...More

review_data.title: Good pizza and service
review_data.content: We had 2 Aperol-spritz, 1 salad and 2 pizzas for CHF 80 which is fair price for Zurich. I had 2 faces pizza. Food is cooked with fresh ingredients and the waitress is friendly. Many repeat clients around this area, Kreuzplatz-Seefeld.

review_data.title: Good, quick, friendly and reasonably priced
review_data.content: It is a nice, small restaurant serving typical Italian dishes, such as pasta, pizza, lasagna, etc. Very tasty and served with great attitude. Reasonable prices for Zurich.

review_data.title: Überrascht

review_data.title: Unaufgeregte Qualität
review_data.content: Reichhaltige, klassisch-italienische Küche, nebst feinen Pizzen. Sehr gutes Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis. Äusserst freundliche Bedienung; gemütliches Interieur... Eine wohltuende Alternative zu vielen durchgestylten...More

review_data.title: Very good food
review_data.content: 155/5000 Very tasty food, friendly service and very good prices. And a very comfortable location. It's worth coming here. Thank you restaurant Sorrento

review_data.title: Top
review_data.content: Freundlicher Empfang, aufmerksamer und sehr freundlicher Service. Ausgezeichnetes Essen, Preis/Leistungsverhältnis sehr gut. Angenehmes Ambiente. Wir kommen wieder.

review_data.content: It is a good place for lunch, offering three lunch dishes incl. a small salad for a reasonable price. Pizzas and pastas are also reasonably priced (small salad as starter extra 4.50 SFr.). Making a reservation, you usually get a table at the window. The...More

review_data.title: Pizza find :)
review_data.content: I'm not sure about their overall menu, but in a very price and generally terrible value-for-money city their pizza is really worthwhile, particularly as takeaway (4-stagioni CHF20 all-in).
